blueprints.name: Automated Recruitment & Marketing Bot
blueprints.description: A bot that automates job postings, candidate processing, and communication with hiring managers.

nodes.name: Search Facebook Groups for Job Posts
nodes.description: Finds relevant Facebook groups based on job-related keywords.

nodes.name: Join 5 New Facebook Groups Daily
nodes.description: Automatically sends requests to join 5 job-related Facebook groups every day.

nodes.name: Scheduled Job Postings
nodes.type: Scheduler / Facebook API / WhatsApp API / Telegram API
nodes.description: Posts 3-4 job listings per day in 5 predefined Facebook groups, the user's Telegram group, and WhatsApp groups.

nodes.name: Post to User's Telegram & WhatsApp Groups
nodes.description: Automatically posts job listings to the user's specified Telegram and WhatsApp groups.

nodes.name: Collect Candidate Applications
nodes.description: Captures candidate applications via Google Forms or email submissions.

nodes.name: Analyze Candidate Responses
nodes.description: Processes candidate details and sends an automated follow-up questionnaire for deeper profiling.

nodes.name: Generate Professional Review & Resume Analysis
nodes.description: Analyzes resumes and writes a professional candidate evaluation report.

nodes.name: Send Candidate Review to Hiring Manager
nodes.description: Sends the candidate report and resume to the hiring manager.

nodes.name: Receive Manager's Feedback
nodes.description: Collects feedback from the hiring manager regarding the candidate.

nodes.name: Interview Scheduling & Candidate Notification
nodes.description: Schedules interviews and confirms candidate attendance via email or WhatsApp.

nodes.name: Candidate Tracking Dashboard
nodes.description: Creates a dashboard to track candidates and their hiring statuses.
